data.prayer: Please, teach the 537 believers in Temburong, Brunei how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Temburong, Brunei
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Temburong
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 9,887 who are far from you in Temburong, Brunei from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Father, help 2 new simple churches start among the 10,900 people in the state of Temburong, Brunei. One within reach of everyone living here.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Melanau people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Please, convict the 537 believers in Temburong, Brunei to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.prayer: Father, may the churches in Temburong, Brunei honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.section_summary:
the state of Temburong, Brunei has a population of 10,900.

We estimate Temburong has 537 people who might know Jesus, 476 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 9,887 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 20 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 537 believers in the state of Temburong.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

location.name: Temburong
